Articles.Content: I'm stuck at the main menu and i have 42 mods... help

We’re going to need more information than that to help you, please read this to find all the relevant information:

At the bare minimum, you should always include:

  • KSP version;
  • A list of mods, whether that’s screenshots of your GameData folder or the list generated by CKAN if you use that, along with versions if possible;
  • Log files, see the above link to find them and what to do with them;
  • Screenshot or video of the problem if relevant.

How exactly are you stuck? Is the game frozen completely and none of the buttons work, or you can click stuff but nothing happens? Can you see Kerbin and the three floating Kerbals or is it stuck on the black loading screen? Is the music playing? Were there any warnings when the game was loading about faulty .dll files, incompatible mods or module manager errors?

I see that you're heavily modded, so that means you have a strong laptop. Am I sure?

State your PC specs.

And also, state your mods and your version.

Those 3 are one of the most crucial factors for your problem

Edited January 3, 2021 by Helvica_Ring_Scientist
